entry.summary: ...HEAVY RAIN FOR LATE WEEK INTO THE WEEKEND... entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 12:16AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...High Water In The Noatak, Kobuk And Koyukuk Valleys... entry.cap:areaDesc: Lower Kobuk and Noatak Valleys; Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys; Upper Kobuk and Noatak Valleys
